CameraInput::PVCamera

CameraInput::PVCamera Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for CameraInput::PVCamera:

Detailed Description

For internal use only.

Class to capture camera input based on Port Video library

Member Function Documentation

bool CameraInput::PVCamera::init ( int  width = 320,
int  height = 240,
int  fps = 25,
bool  color = true 
) [virtual]

Initializes the class so it becomes valid.

For internal use only.

Parameters:
[in] width Width resolution to capture form camera
[in] height Height resolution to capture form camera
[in] fps FPS to capture form camera
[in] color if true captured images will be color (if supported by the camera), false means b/w
Returns:
true if the initialization was ok | false otherwise

Captures new image from camera.

For internal use only.

Note:
this is a blocking call -> would be good to have it in a separate thread
